Html:
Hello radioman,

I have a problem with the AccessMode.ServerAndCache in Win 7, 64 bit(it is wrote on the map, "We are sorry, but we don't have imagery..."). I think it could'nt write to the cache folder in Win 7. When I change mode to only Server, it works, but as you know, it is slow. I think it is because cache folder permissions of Win 7. Do you have an idea about this failure, and how can I achieve this problem?

By the way, thank you for your answer of past discussion which is about finding specific point in a rectangle area...
Is it possible to maintain single build for both 32 bit and 64 bit without modifying code?
